user_question: Can you create a personalized weekly workout plan for someone who wants to improve flexibility and generate an image of a yoga pose?
final_answer:
Personalized weekly workout plan created focusing on flexibility: 
- Monday: Yoga (30 mins)
- Tuesday: Pilates (30 mins)
- Wednesday: Rest
- Thursday: Dynamic Stretching (20 mins)
- Friday: Yoga (30 mins)
- Saturday: Tai Chi (30 mins)
- Sunday: Rest. Image of a yoga pose generated. Nutritional advice: Stay hydrated, consume foods rich in omega-3 fatty acids, protein, and antioxidants like berries, nuts, and leafy greens.
